description: Warm, thick fleece vest that is knitted on the outside and softly brushed on the inside. G-1000 Original reinforcement across the shoulders for extra durability, which is practical when carrying a backpack. Perfect as a warm middle layer when skiing and can also be worn when you are relaxing in the cabin. Two side pockets and one breast pocket. Zipper in the front with protective flap at the chin. Regular fit.
name: Fjallraven Buck Fleece Vest - Mens
